metadata.title: iSpell - Free and easy-to-use language learning platform
metadata.description: A free language learning platform focused on vocabulary memorization and review, helping you master new words efficiently.

LoginModal.title: Welcome
LoginModal.newUserHint: New users will be registered automatically
LoginModal.agreePolicyPrefix: I have read and agree to the

ResetPasswordModal.title: Reset Password
ResetPasswordModal.resetSuccess: Password reset successful, please login with your new password

LearningStart.title: Ready
LearningStart.noActiveBookDescription: Pick a book from the bookshelf to start learning
LearningStart.noActiveBookDescription2: The power to change the world is at your fingertips.
LearningStart.congratsBookCompleteDesc: You have completed all chapters of {bookName}

LearningView.noLearningBooks: You are not learning any books, go pick one.

empty.title: Bookshelf is empty
empty.alt: An illustration of an astronaut exploring

errors.needLogin: Please log in to create a learning plan~

NONE.name: No Review
NONE.description: Only learn new words, no reviews. Suitable for those with a foundation or for pre-exam cramming.

EBBINGHAUS.name: Ebbinghaus
EBBINGHAUS.description: Based on the Ebbinghaus forgetting curve, intelligently schedules reviews at key forgetting points (e.g., 1, 2, 4, 7 days).

SM2.name: SM-2 Algorithm
SM2.description: Intelligent spaced repetition, dynamically adjusts the best review time for each word based on your answers.

LEITNER.name: Leitner System
LEITNER.description: Classic flashcard box system. Correct words move to the next level (longer interval), incorrect words return to the first level.

aria.bookRadiogroupLabel: Select a word book to learn

PlanWordsModal.title: Word Plan: {bookName}
PlanWordsModal.error: Could not load plan, please try again later.

MistakeModal.title: Mistake List: {bookName}
MistakeModal.error: Could not load mistake list, please try again later.
MistakeModal.empty: Great! The mistake list is empty.
MistakeModal.emptyReview: Mistake list is empty, no review needed.
MistakeModal.clearAllConfirmDesc: This will permanently delete all mistake records for "{bookName}" and cannot be undone.
MistakeModal.strategyHint: Tip: Correct spelling reduces the misspell count. Words are automatically removed from the list when the count reaches 0.

Settings.feedbackCardDescription: Encountered a problem or have a suggestion? We're here to listen.

messages.operationFailed: Operation failed, please try again later

Errors.min8: Password must be at least 8 characters
Errors.passwordsMismatch: The two passwords do not match

Errors.noEmailORPhone: No available email or phone to send code

Errors.oauthFailed: Third-party login failed, please try again later
Errors.oauthStateMismatch: Security verification failed, please refresh and try again

Profile.pageDescription: Manage your personal information, password, and account bindings

profileInfo.title: Profile
profileInfo.avatarHint:
Click avatar to change image
Supports JPG, PNG formats, up to 2MB

changePassword.title: Change Password
changePassword.description: Change your login password using a verification code.
changePassword.setPasswordDescription: You are currently logged in with a third-party account and have not set a password. You can set a login password here.

accountBindings.title: Account Bindings
accountBindings.description: Bind third-party accounts for quick login
accountBindings.unbindConfirm: Are you sure you want to unbind from {provider}?
accountBindings.bindFailed: Failed to get binding link, please try again later

deleteAccount.title: Danger Zone
deleteAccount.description: Proceed with caution. Once your account is deleted, all data will be unrecoverable, including your learning records, personal settings, and bound third-party accounts.
deleteAccount.modalTitle: Are you sure you want to delete your account?
deleteAccount.deleteInfo1: All your learning plans, progress, and personal information will be permanently deleted.
deleteAccount.deleteInfo2: Your nickname and avatar will be reset, and bound third-party accounts will be unlinked.
deleteAccount.confirmInputLabel: Please enter your nickname “{nickname}” to confirm deletion.
deleteAccount.deleteSuccess: Your account has been deleted successfully
deleteAccount.deleteFailed: Deletion failed, please try again later

qrCode.scanHint: Long-press to scan QR code to donate

footer.thankYou: Thank you for your kindness and support, giving more children equal learning opportunities

certificate.altText: Large image of donation disclosure certificate

publicity.title: Donation Income and Expenditure
publicity.updateHint: Data is updated monthly to ensure transparency. All donations are public and open to supervision.
publicity.empty: No disclosure data available yet. First month's data will be updated early next month.

main.title: Donate
main.subtitle: Support the healthy growth of every rural child, let their future shine
main.desc1: In some remote, mountainous areas, quality learning resources are scarce. Children here have few opportunities to learn about the outside world. They are eager to explore knowledge but face barriers due to a lack of basic materials, equipment, and guidance. We hope to gather everyone's support to build a bridge to the future for these children.
main.desc2: We only deduct necessary basic costs to maintain the website. All remaining donations will be used to support learning for children in remote areas.

donateNow.title: Donate Now
donateNow.hint: Choose your preferred payment method and scan the QR code to donate. Every donation will provide substantial help to children in remote areas.

instructions.title: Donation-Instructions
instructions.item1: Except for basic operational costs (server, domain, etc.), all funds are used for public welfare learning projects in remote areas.
instructions.item2: Monthly disclosure of income and expenditure ensures transparency and accountability, open to public supervision.
instructions.item3: Any amount is appreciated. Every cent provides substantial help to children.
instructions.item4: Operational costs are kept to a minimum to maximize the funds' public welfare use.

FeedbackModal.title: Feedback
FeedbackModal.contentPlaceholder: Please describe the problem or suggestion in detail (within 2000 characters)
FeedbackModal.submitError: Submission failed, please try again later.
FeedbackModal.contactPlaceholder: If you want us to reply...
FeedbackModal.contactHint: Non-logged-in users can fill in email so we can contact you.

WordDisplay.loginPrompt: Log in to view example sentences, save learning progress, and mistake records.

DonateBanner.text: Support the healthy growth of every rural child, let their future shine.

v1_0_0.new2: Supports login via Email/Password, Email Verification Code, and third-party (GitHub, Google) authentication.
v1_0_0.new3: Implemented spelling and learning modules, including word browsing, plan creation, spelling practice, and smart review.
v1_0_0.docs1: Launched 67 English word books, covering all scenarios from student phase to studying abroad.
